name: Delightful Beacon Hill 1 Bed | 1 Bath
description:
This recently renovated 1 BR | 1 BA condo is beautifully furnished and comes with everything you need for an enjoyable stay. Located in the heart of Boston's most desirable neighborhood, Beacon Hill, you could not be more conveniently located to take in all the city has to offer.
The condo features an open concept kitchen and living room, stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher), hardwood floors throughout, and washer/dryer in unit.

The space
- This condo is professionally cleaned and disinfected between guests. Safety is our priority!

- Condo is on the third floor of a brownstone in Boston's historic Beacon Hill, which is one of the oldest and most picturesque neighborhoods in the United States. The building is ideally located on the "flat of the hill", just steps off of Charles St and minutes walk to Boston Common, Public Garden, the Charles River, Mass General Hospital, Charles/MGH MBTA stop (subway), Newbury Street, Financial Distric
